div.p: This value sets refers to 3 different sources of observation method codes, each with issues:

ul.li: SNOMED CT Techniques (descendants of 272394005): As for August 2015, this is relatively complete (e.g. includes all LOINC methods). However this includes more than just observation methods, and is subject to the normal SNOMED CT licensing rules
v3 Code System "ObservationMethod": this is very incomplete and not currently maintained

div.p: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

description.value: Observation Method codes from SNOMED CT (codes subsumed by 272394005 "Technique", and the v3 Code System "ObservationMethod" (which is no longer actively maintained).

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
